results.title: Repurposing of Various Current Medicines as Radioprotective Agents.
results.text_hl: Many other agents such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Edaravone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077553 @@@edaravone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Tiopronin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008625 @@@mercaptopropionylglycine@@@ indicated in specific diseases such as @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@cerebral infarction@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Cystinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003555 @@@cystinuria@@@ have shown radioprotective action.

citations.NLM: Kaur R, Lang DK, Singh H, Arora A, Garg N, Saini B. Repurposing of Various Current Medicines as Radioprotective Agents. Anticancer Agents Med Chem. 2022 Apr 4;():. PMID: 35379128
